name: endfcop-monorepo
description: ENDFCOP (Ethiopian National Defence Forces Common Operational Picture) monorepo

scripts.build: npm run -w @endfcop/api build && npm run -w @endfcop/web build
scripts.dev: npm run -w @endfcop/api dev & npm run -w @endfcop/web dev
scripts.test: npm run -w @endfcop/api test && npm run -w @endfcop/web test
scripts.lint: npm run -w @endfcop/api lint && npm run -w @endfcop/web lint
scripts.format: npm run -w @endfcop/api format && npm run -w @endfcop/web format
